page.title: 10MY STREET
page.content:
My street is called Apperley Avenue. It is situated in an estate of private houses in High Shincliffe. All of the houses are 9 years old, and there are 19 houses arranged in a cul de sac. The road has a tarmacadam surface and there are 6 street drains which carry away surface water. There are also 5 electric lamposts which light up the street at night. Motor cars are allowed to park in the street, but each home has space for parking a car,as well as a garage. The street is purely residential, as there are no shops, businesses, or factories.
(Sarah Tilley (10))
